plugins\/jazpar\/plugin_info\/configurat.Ajouter un message dans le centre de mes: Add an entry in the message center when a captcha is detected
plugins\/jazpar\/plugin_info\/configurat.Désactiver l'équipement lorsqu'un captch: Disable the equipment when a captcha is detected
plugins\/jazpar\/plugin_info\/configurat.Suivant les régions, GRDF donne la derni: Depending on users, GRDF is giving the last daily consumption at D-1, D-2... To prevent the plugin querying the website for nothing, specify the number of days delay you generally witness

plugins\/jazpar\/desktop\/php\/jazpar.ph.Cocher la case pour forcer la récupérati: Check this option to force data retrieval even if data already present for concerned periods
plugins\/jazpar\/desktop\/php\/jazpar.ph.Sélectionnez le template de widget à uti: Choose the widget's template to use
plugins\/jazpar\/desktop\/php\/jazpar.ph.Exemple de rendu avec le template de wid: Example of display with selected widget's template:
plugins\/jazpar\/desktop\/php\/jazpar.ph.Sélectionnez l'unité à utiliser par défa: Choose the unit to use by default (only for widget Jazpar 2)
plugins\/jazpar\/desktop\/php\/jazpar.ph.Cocher la case pour utiliser des dates p: Check this option to use dates instead of command names in widgets
plugins\/jazpar\/desktop\/php\/jazpar.ph.Cocher la case pour arrondir les valeurs: Check this option to round values in widgets
plugins\/jazpar\/desktop\/php\/jazpar.ph.Indiquez le numéro PCE si vous possédez: Specify the PCE number if you own several gas meters (optional)

plugins\/jazpar\/core\/class\/jazpar.cla.Erreur d\\'authentification : vérifier l: Authentication error: check the validity of the username and password
plugins\/jazpar\/core\/class\/jazpar.cla.L\\'identifiant du compte GRDF doit être: The identifier of the GRDF account must be entered
plugins\/jazpar\/core\/class\/jazpar.cla.Le mot de passe du compte GRDF doit être: The password for the GRDF account must be entered
plugins\/jazpar\/core\/class\/jazpar.cla.Le nombre de jours doit être un entier p: The number of days must be a positive integer or 0
plugins\/jazpar\/core\/class\/jazpar.cla.Un captcha a été détecté. Connectez-vous: A captcha has been detected. Connect to your account to resolve it.

info.json.Récupérer les informations du compteur c: Retrieve the information of the Gazpar smart meter from their GRDF customer account.
